data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30291, Version Hash: c901c454f8689656ef39f25acf852937d074187a
data.actual_result: A blank settings pane (which is supposed to be "Game Library") opens
data.expected_result: Clicking on "In library (hidden)" won't do anything on the web app
data.short_description: Clicking on a hidden game in the store on the web app will open an empty settings pane
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the web app, not the desktop app - Right click on a game in your library, and click "Hide game from library" - Go to that game's page in the store - Cick on the text that says "In library (hidden)" - The app should open an empty settings pane
